title: Cornitos Wins Big at CMO Asia Excellence AwardsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Cornitos Wins Big at CMO Asia Excellence Awards Published on : Thursday, August 27, 2015
Cornitos, the flagship brand of GreenDot Health Foods Ltd and the market leader of Tortilla Crisp in Indian branded snack food industry has been awarded with the Best Food and Grocery Brand of the Year in Snack Category at the prestigious CMO Asia Excellence Awards held at Pan Pacific, Marina Square, Singapore. The brand was also conferred with a Certificate of Merit in Ready to Eat food category.
The CMO Asia Excellence award which acknowledges global brands across various industry segments adjudged Cornitos achievement in several categories in terms of Innovation, Product Diversification, Customer Satisfaction, Excellent Quality Standards and Market Leadership. Cornitos brand has created a niche in the industry as a healthy and tasty snacking option suiting the customer’s palate has also ventured in the active and healthy lifestyle segment with the launch of newer products with a global twist suiting the taste palate of its patrons. Apart from 10 exotic nacho flavors it also offers authentic Mexican Salsa dips and Coated Green Peas under its Pop n Crunch range.
Talking about the achievement Mr. Vikram Agarwal, Director of Greendot Health Foods Limited said “Being awarded in two different categories by the illustrious CMO Asia is indeed a moment of great pride and privilege for us. Our team remains committed towards quality products bringing in affordable yet healthy snacking options thus attempting to usher in a conscious change in the Snack Industry in India. It is always fruitful to spend on consumer research. It is the product that matters eventually.”
He further added, “Cornitos is concentrating to increase the production and introduce premium product ranges this year and the recognition at this prestigious forum confirms our growing performance. I dedicate this award to my family members and our dynamic team and moreover special thanks to CMO Asia for this recognition.”
Source:- GreenDot Health Foods
